remarks: Closure of a finite product of real numbers.  A version of ~ fprodrecl using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodreclf.kph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprodcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodrecl.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
fprodreclf $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B e. RR ) $.
$d A k $.
